58 class SourceFile : public Source {
59  public:
60  static SourceRef createRef( DataSourceRef dataSourceRef ) { return createFileRef( dataSourceRef ); }
61  static SourceFileRef createFileRef( DataSourceRef dataSourceRef );
62  ~SourceFile();
63 
64  virtual LoaderRef createLoader( Target *target ) { return LoaderSourceFile::createRef( this, target ); }
65 
66  double getDuration() const { return mDuration; };
67 
68  static void registerSelf();
69  protected:
70  SourceFile( DataSourceRef dataSourceRef );
71 
72  uint64_t packetAtTime( double aTime ) const;
73  double timeAtPacket( uint64_t aPacket ) const;
